name: mongo-driver-benchmarks
description: benchmarks comparison for mongodb native driver 1.X and 2.X
author: bubenshchykov

scripts.test:
echo "testing localhost mongo with journal:false" && node . mongodb://localhost/_mongobench?journal=false && echo "
testing localhost mongo with journal:true" && node . mongodb://localhost/_mongobench?journal=true
scripts.postinstall:
echo "
Installing mongodb driver v1.X ...
" && mkdir -p ./node_modules/mongodb_v1/node_modules && npm install --prefix ./node_modules/mongodb_v1 git+https://github.com/mongodb/node-mongodb-native.git#V1.4.28 && echo "
Installing mongodb driver v2.X ...
" && mkdir -p ./node_modules/mongodb_v2/node_modules && npm install --prefix ./node_modules/mongodb_v2 git+https://github.com/mongodb/node-mongodb-native.git#V2.0.13
